input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item features and item title information.

Item title:
iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets Shooter Targets for Shooting Range Target

Item features:
Thermal Targets
Made In USA
13x19 Size
Thick Paper Targets
iCandy Combat Design
input_text.Response A: These thermal targets are the ultimate shooting range addition for any shooter looking to up their game. The iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets are 13x19-inch thick paper targets featuring the iconic iCandy Combat design. Made in the USA, these targets are a must-have for any shooter looking to improve their accuracy and precision. With thermal targets, you can see your shots on the target even in low-light conditions, making it easier to track your progress and see your improvements. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, these targets are a must-have for any shooter. So, come on and give them a try today!
input_text.Response B: iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets are the perfect way to have fun while improving your accuracy. These 13x19-inch targets are made from thick paper and feature a unique iCandy Combat design. They are perfect for use at the shooting range and are available in a pack of 25. The thermal targets make it easy to see your shots, so you can adjust your aim and improve your skills. Made in the USA.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
